Can anyone offer any assistance with a scrolling issue im having, the pages "flicker" when a user scrolls up and down. HubSpot chat said that they think it might be this line of code "mousescrollstep    : 50," Has anyone had any similar issues? Do i even need that line of code?

Hi there, my company has a newsletter set up in HubSpot to auto send each Friday. It is pulling an RSS feed from our website - and we need to know how to edit the feed to exclude certain categories of posts. Our site, and the RSS feed is on Wordpress. Any advice?
can you share a link to the site?

Second one - I'm looking for a HubSpot expert to create some email newsletter and landing page master templates for me within HubSpot. How long does it take to do this? And if you can do this, what is your day rate? Thanks!
<@UNL7A6946> this post can help you - <https://www.wpbeginner.com/wp-tutorials/how-to-exclude-specific-categories-from-wordpress-rss-feed/>
have you tried it without this line? In my opinion, setting a different mouse scroll is bound to be a bad user experience.

Hi! I want to get the author title like Marketer, Developer, Consultant ect, I was using `{{ content.blog_post_author.bio }}`, but it retrieves the Author description not the title.  What Hubl tag can I use? I googled for a long time now.
<https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/hubl/blog-content-markup>
<@UM433J43U> have you tried with `{{ content.blog_post_author.display_name }}`
<@UCH1L597V>  `{{ content.blog_post_author.display_name }}` displays the title of the post. But for me, I want the Job Title of the Author

blog_post_author supports those many properties

content.blog_post_author.avatar,
content.blog_post_author.bio,
content.blog_post_author.display_name,
content.blog_post_author.email,
content.blog_post_author.facebook,
content.blog_post_author.google_plus,
content.blog_post_author.has_social_profiles,
content.blog_post_author.linkedin,
content.blog_post_author.slug,
content.blog_post_author.twitter,
and content.blog_post_author.website
wwww
<http://www.starcompliance.com|www.starcompliance.com>
Thanks you for replying Andreas. This is issue only happens on windows browers
yes i can see it

Hi Everyone, I’m trying to resolve many problems on my website, using SEMrush. I have a problem with unminified content, such as this script : <https://js.hs-scripts.com/423121.js>

Can anyone tell me if there is a solution for this ? I’m afraid not
<@UNL728TTQ> the error seems to be because of nicescroll js you are using in your theme, you can remove that or update to the latest library might fix it. `jquery.nicescroll 3.6.0 InuYaksa*2014`

Hey <@UAV0S9P1C> so for this file minification is enabled on the CDN, however, the caching time for this file is not very long. We didn’t want to make it too long on the chance there are updates that are ever made to this.

For low traffic sites, the first time this file is requested, the JS won’t be minified. Subsequent requests will be minified until the cache is expired.

Can you try re-kicking off the SEMRush crawl and let us know if the file still shows as unminified?

cc <@U6TBZ66FN>
thank you so much guys
<@U2H3TT8F2> Hey :slightly_smiling_face: I’m running it, I let you know asap
always welcome :slightly_smiling_face:
seriously i have had some very angry people moaning about this
as a test, i just viewed the link you sent, then refreshed the page and it showed as minified :slightly_smiling_face:
do you think that its really necessary to have it Umakant?
Yep same for me, I hope SEMrush will understand that lol :slightly_smiling_face:
in my opinion you can remove it
:crossed_fingers:
I increased the CDN cache time for those to 30 minutes to make it better caching. <@U22PJPGK0>
thanks again

Last Question:  I created custom module, then I edited that module and I did not Publish it and I closed the browser. Now I want to *undo* changes because I forget what I did before I closed the browser.  *undo* button is not clickable, only *publish* button is clickable but I don't what want to publish, I want to go back to previous code.
Try revisions - I don’t recall if it stores a revision only on publish or on save. It’s worth a try though
to open the revisions, find the module in the finder, right click it, choose “show revisions”
I double checked but I still have the errors on my end
I’ll let you know if it’s still there tomorrow :slightly_smiling_face: thanks guys
<@U7SL518D6>, Thank you. You saved me

Hey, I'm using a HubSpot form in a WordPress website and i need to be able to send the form data in the querystring of the thankyou page so I can customize the response (and eventually redirect to a different page to download/install and app). Any (easy) way to do that?
Looks like if you’re under settings and go to website > pages. You arrive at a blank screen, and all the content is below the fold, and overflows the screen horizontally.
nevermind, i found it in the community website
Hello, I am designing a microsite using hubdb for pages, I want to show a list of the most viewed pages, I don't know how this could be done, someone who has any ideas?
Hummm... I don't think we have public information available about numbers/locations of developers.
I can try and find something tho - Help me understand the desired outcome you're looking to get with your devs <@U6Z3FRJ2D>... I can see what might help.
I can say "Developers in this slack team" = 3,875 ... 12-months ago it was ~750
The Investor Relations area is a good place to get some stats / growth charts: <https://ir.HubSpot.com/events>
This is the latest deck:

You could also play them my talk from the <#CCGU4R4ER|extend> (minute 27:26): <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VpArzDy5ny4>

I have some public stats and jazz up/inspire the developers there. :slightly_smiling_face:
This should be fixed now <@U7AU6414J>!

Hi ! Can you please tell me if there is an error here. *count* does not increment but *if statement* is true because when I print a word then it prints, but now I want to increment *count* but the increment is not working at all. When I print count inside this *if statement* then it prints 0 as many times as the loop. but it does not *increment* .  PLEASE let me know If I'm doing it wrong way
            `{% set count = 0 %}`
`                  {% for content in contents %}`
`                       {% for topic in content.topic_list %}`

`                            {% if topic.slug == "organisatieontwikkeling" %}`
`                                {%  set count = count + 1 %}`
`                           {% endif %}`
`                        `
`                       {% endfor %}`
`                  {% endfor %} `
`        {{ count }}`
